channel.title: CVE Feed for bmaltais -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for bmaltais -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-32022|2024-04-19T16:09:48.861Z -- bmaltais -- kohya_ss
item.description: Kohya_ss is a GUI for Kohya's Stable Diffusion trainers. Kohya_ss is vulnerable to command injection in basic_caption_gui.py. This vulnerability is fixed in 23.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-32023|2024-06-04T17:51:47.845Z -- bmaltais -- kohya_ss
item.description: Kohya_ss is a GUI for Kohya's Stable Diffusion trainers. Kohya_ss is vulnerable to a path injection in the `common_gui.py` `find_and_replace` function. This vulnerability is fixed in 23.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-32024|2024-04-19T16:11:49.731Z -- bmaltais -- kohya_ss
item.description: Kohya_ss is a GUI for Kohya's Stable Diffusion trainers. Kohya_ss is vulnerable to a path injection in the `common_gui.py` `add_pre_postfix` function. This vulnerability is fixed in 23.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-32025|2024-06-04T17:51:20.289Z -- bmaltais -- kohya_ss
item.description: Kohya_ss is a GUI for Kohya's Stable Diffusion trainers. Kohya_ss is vulnerable to a command injection in `group_images_gui.py`. This vulnerability is fixed in 23.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-32026|2024-06-04T17:50:50.663Z -- bmaltais -- kohya_ss
item.description: Kohya_ss is a GUI for Kohya's Stable Diffusion trainers. Kohya_ss is vulnerable to a command injection in `git_caption_gui.py`. This vulnerability is fixed in 23.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-32027|2024-06-04T17:50:37.566Z -- bmaltais -- kohya_ss
item.description: Kohya_ss is a GUI for Kohya's Stable Diffusion trainers. Kohya_ss v22.6.1 is vulnerable to command injection in `finetune_gui.py` This vulnerability is fixed in 23.1.5.
